KitKat3::

She left the lab, despite Squizzy's objections.  She found her way to 
the bridge and looked around.  She noticed the communication consoles 
and security stations.  She saw the armorment data logs and supply 
listings.  She smiled and started to study them.  If she was now 
under command of Zardus, then she might was well be the best soldier 
he ever had. And to be the best, one had to know everything about 
where they were, what was going on and how to best deal with 
situations.  She was already a good leader, but now was her time to 
follow another leader.  She studied and took notes on all she read.  
After she felt like she had enough information for one day, she 
opened her commlink, "Zardus, this is KitKat3, requesting an 
asignment."
